import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import '../Style/Home.scss'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const navRef = useRef(); const [ navPosition, setNavPosition ] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { handleNavPosition(); }); }) const handleNavPosition = () => { if(window.pageYOffset > navRef.current.offsetTop * 1.8) { setNavPosition(false); }else { setNavPosition(-window.pageYOffset * .5); } } const navStyle = { transform: `translateY(${navPosition}px)` } return (
